info: Rating, 2 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed one night
rating_comment:
Compared to the cleaning fees charged, the room should've been cleaner. Unfortunately, there were cockroaches, commode seat was wet and dirty, the poly wrap of the mattress was not removed, which was making it more uncomfortable.
The communication could have been more professional.

info: Rating, 1 star,  · November 2022,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Horribly dirty room with poop stains on mattress and all kinds of stains on the bed sheets, curtains, walls. Dirty dishes, bathroom etc. Wifi doesn't work during load-shedding, rude and lying host said cleaners come after 4 days always but cleaners told me that they clean daily. She told me a higher rate of the room on phone before booking than what was written on Airbnb and told me that before 11, I can't enter the room but airbnb said that 8 am is the check in time. Didn't let me use wifi. Worst stay ever.

rating_comment: I booked for one place got a diff address. It was last min so I did not changed the booking. I had to change the room cause it was small very small. Even the room I got was small which cost me extra. Another annoying part was they don’t allow guest At all.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2022,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: Mr. Alvir is a very caring host. The place is convenient, clean and not far from the airport and important business places. Restaurent is serving good food on demand. I will happily recommend visitors to try this place.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2021,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Really can recommend to stay in this AirBnb, the building is in a very new and secure compound, the rooms were equipped with everything you need, the service in the building was super polite and friendly. They have on ground floor own kitchen and can deliver the food to your room :) food was super delicious (Bangladeshi dishes were my favorites). The scenery on the 10th floor was so wonderful! You can call laundry service, which is really super great. The wifi was working perfectly!
The location is approx. 15 minutes from airport and 15 minutes by Riksha from one of the biggest malls in Dhaka called Jamuna Future Park.
We will definitely come again to that AirBnb when staying in Dhaka.
